pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hydro and Thermal Time Seed Germination Models in R // Analysis of seed germination data using the physiological time modelling approach. Includes functions to fit hydrotime and thermal-time models with the traditional approaches of Bradford (1990) doi:10.1104/pp.94.2.840 and Garcia-Huidobro (1982) doi:10.1093/jxb/33.2.288. Allows to fit models to grouped datasets, i.e. datasets containing multiple species, seedlots or experiments.
